snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is preparing a proposal that would allow hydraulic fracturing for gas only in areas where deposits are at least 2,000 feet deep.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is preparing a proposal that would allow hydraulic fracturing for gas only in areas where deposits are at least 2,000 feet deep.

headline.seo: A Plan to Regulate Gas Drilling
headline.main: A Plan to Regulate Gas Drilling
